original_title: COPF approves Domestic Debt Optimization program
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Sri Lankan governments' domestic debt optimization program received the green light from the Committee on Public Finance on Friday (30) evening.
The Sri Lankan Parliament in a statement said that the program was approved by a majority membership of the COPF.
The Committee on Parliamentary Business has decided that the debate on Domestic Debt Optimization will take place from 9:30 AM to 7:30 PM on Saturday (1).
The Secretary General of the Parliament earlier informed all the Members of Parliament that the Parliament shall convene on the 01st of July 2023, via a letter.

On the request of the Prime Minister, the Speaker issued a Gazette Extraordinary stating that the Parliament shall convene at 09.30 a.m. on Saturday, the 01st of July in accordance with the Standing Orders No. 16 of the Parliament.

CCPI based headline inflation records another sharp decline in June 2023
